craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 10% Critical Strike Damage and 40 bonus Ability Power (including components).

Magic and true damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant a shield to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row that blocks the first enemy Ability, up to 600 damage.

[Aura item]

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 25% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 40 starting Mana (including components). Gain 20 Mana after casting an Ability.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 60 bonus Armor (including components). Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30 Ability Power to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

[Aura item]

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 120 bonus Magic Resist (including components). Every 2 seconds, regenerate 1.2% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder.

If the holder is a Dragon, increase all bonuses and effects by 20%.

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 30%.

[Aura item]
[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 2200 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 45%.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become stealthed, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. Then, grant 40% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 6% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 2 effects:
- +15 Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power.
- 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: Grant 25% Omnivamp. Damage heals the lowest Health ally for the same amount.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% converts to 1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

[Aura item]
[Direct damage item]

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Grant 16 Armor and 16 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
Dealing physical damage reduces the target's Armor by 50% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Shield the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400★ damage for 15 seconds.

[Aura item]

craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 35/50/65★ bonus Attack Damage (including components).

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 30 bonus Ability Power.

Combat start: Grant 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 40 bonus Ability Power (including components). Magic or true damage from an Ability burns the target, dealing 10% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 20% bonus Attack Speed.

Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 15 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Grants 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 50% bonus Attack Speed (including components) and 1 Attack Range.

Attacks cannot miss.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 12% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

[Aura item]

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 10 Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at nearby enemy, dealing 70% Attack Damage as physical damage.

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Shoots a beam that increases the maximum Mana of affected enemies by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: Attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 10% bonus Attack Speed (including components). Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 50 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 250 bonus Health (including components). Every 2 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 10% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25.

At full stacks grant 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Grant 1000 bonus Health (including components).

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

[Aura item]

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Taunts enemies within 4 hexes.

On death, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

radi.name: RadientArchangelsStaff
radi.add_attrs:
Now grants the wearer 25 ability power every 5 seconds..

Radiant Bonus: +15 Starting Mana

radi.name: RadientBansheesClaw
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

Radiant Bonus: +50 Health for all allies at the start of combat.

radi.name: RadientBloodthirster
radi.add_attrs:
Damage heals the holder for 35% of the damage dealt. Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 40% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +20 Attack Damage

radi.name: RadientBlueBuff
radi.add_attrs:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 30 Mana.

Radiant Bonus: +40 Ability Power

radi.name: RadientBrambleVest
radi.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 125/175/225★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

radi.name: RadientChaliceofPower
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 50 Ability Power and 10% Omnivamp for the rest of combat.

[Aura item]

radi.name: RadientDeathblade
radi.add_attrs: The holder gains 50/85/115★ bonus Attack Damage (including components).

radi.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radi.add_attrs:
Grants 180 bonus Magic Resist (including components). Every 1.5 seconds, regenerate 2.5% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder.

If the holder is a Dragon, increase all bonuses and effects by 20%.

radi.name: RadientEdgeofNight
radi.add_attrs: When the holder first drops below 50% Health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains 40% bonus Attack Speed. Triggers again at 30% Health.

radi.name: RadientFrozenHeart
radi.add_attrs:
Unique Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 50%.

Radiant bonus: +30 Mana

radi.name: RadientGargoyleStoneplate
radi.add_attrs:
The holder gains 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

radi.name: RadientGiantSlayer
radi.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 40% bonus damage. If the target has more than 2000 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 70%.

radi.name: RadientGuinsoosRageblade
radi.add_attrs:
Attacks grant +10% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

Radiant Bonus: +30% Attack Speed

radi.name: RadientHandofJustice
radi.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder gains both of the following:
+35 Attack Damage and +35 Ability Power.
Attacks and Abilities heal for 35% of damage dealt.

radi.name: RadientHextechGunblade
radi.add_attrs:
The holder's damage heal them for 40% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Ability Power

radi.name: RadientInfinityEdge
radi.add_attrs:
Unique Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

Radiant Bonus: +50% Critical Strike Damage

radi.name: RadientIonicSpark
radi.add_attrs:
Enemies within 3 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped, taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

radi.name: RadientJeweledGauntlet
radi.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 60 Ability Power.

radi.name: RadientLastWhisper
radi.add_attrs:
When the holder deals physical damage, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

Radiant Bonus: +35% Critical Strike Chance

radi.name: RadientLocketoftheIronSolari
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 3 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 400/500/600★ damage for 60 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: Grants 200 Health for all allies at the start of combat.

radi.name: RadientMorellonomicon
radi.add_attrs: Grants 80 bonus Ability Power (including components). When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 60% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

radi.name: RadientQuicksilver
radi.add_attrs:
The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for 30 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +50% Attack Speed

radi.name: RadientRabadonsDeathcap
radi.add_attrs: Grants 125 bonus Ability Power (including components).

radi.name: RadientRapidFirecannon
radi.add_attrs: Increases the holder's Attack Range by 2 hexes and grants 75% bonus Attack Speed (including components). The wearer's attacks can no longer miss.

radi.name: RadientRedemption
radi.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 2 hexes, healing them for 18% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +150 Health

radi.name: RadientRunaansHurricane
radi.add_attrs:
The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 110% of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

Radiant Bonus: +30% Attack Speed

radi.name: RadientShroudofStillness
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 50% until they cast.

Radiant Bonus: +15 Mana for all allies at the start of combat

radi.name: RadientSpearofShojin
radi.add_attrs:
The holder's attacks restore 12 additional Mana.

Radiant Passive: +30 Ability Power.

radi.name: RadientStatikkShiv
radi.add_attrs: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 75 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

radi.name: RadientSunfireCape
radi.add_attrs:
Grants 600 bonus Health (including components). Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 4 hexes is burned for 60% of their maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radi.name: RadientThiefsGloves
radi.add_attrs:
At the beginning of the planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

radi.name: RadientTitansResolve
radi.add_attrs: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power. This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

radi.name: RadientWarmogsArmor
radi.add_attrs:
Grants 1600 bonus Health (including components).

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

radi.name: RadientZekesHerald
radi.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 10% hexes in the same row gain 50% Attack Speed and 10% Lifesteal for the rest of combat.

radi.name: RadientZephyr
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

Radiant Bonus: +20% Attack Speed for all allies at the start of combat

radi.name: RadientZzRotPortal
radi.add_attrs: At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the holder dies, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus stats arises taunting nearby enemies. Radiant Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

arti.name: OrnnItemBlackCleaver
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer's basic attacks and spell damage shred enemy armor and magic resistance by 60% for 4 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 5 seconds as non-lethal damage. The holder's Attacks and Abilities also heal for 20% of damage dealt.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemEverfrost
arti.add_attrs:
Enemies who damage the holder have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2 seconds. After being slowed this way 7 times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every 15 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore 200 mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemRanduinsOmen
arti.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain 50 bonus armor and 50 bonus magic resistance for the rest of combat.

[Aura item]

arti.name: OrnnItemRocketPropelledFist
arti.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, the wearer Airborne pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, Stun stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy. (Always targets a different unit than Blitzcrank)

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemSpiritVisage
arti.add_attrs: The wearer regenerates 5% of their maximum health each second.

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer executes enemies below 10% health on-hit. Executions generate 1 gold 50% of the time.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs: Armor +30, Attack Damage +30, Attack Speed +30%, Health +30, Magic Resist +30, Ability Power +30

arti.name: OrnnItemZhonyasHourglass
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

trait_items.name: DravensAxe
trait_items.desc:
Gain 1 Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 80).

Attack grant 1 stack, up to 100 times, At full stacks, grant 7 gold and 1 item component(s).

trait_items.name: GoldmancersStaff
trait_items.desc: Gain 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 80) and a 50% chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

trait_items.name: GamblersBlade
trait_items.desc: Gain 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 80). Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

trait_items.name: MogulsMail
trait_items.desc:
Grant 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 8 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times.

At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

trait_items.name: DeterminedInvestor
trait_items.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator and 15 gold.

trait_items.name: DiamondHands
trait_items.desc: Once per combat at 66% and 33% Health, gain 1 gold and immunity for 1 seconds.

trait_items.name: NeedlesslyBigGem
trait_items.desc: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 1% more damage per gold you have. For every 2 units alive when this happens, gain 1 gold.

trait_items.name: CrownofChampions
trait_items.desc: Every 5 seconds, the next attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank in true damage.

spec.name: DragonmancersBlessing
spec.desc:
Use on a Dragonmancer to make them your Dragonmancer Hero.

[Cannot be used in combat.]

spec.name: DarkflightEssence
spec.desc:
Health +130, Attack +13, Ability Power +13, Defense +13, Magic Resistance +13

[Acquired by copying items that cannot be crafted with the Descent of Darkness attribute]
